Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Leatrice Johnson
Reviews.Content: I received the product on time and in excellent condition. The esn was clear and I was able to get the phone activated with no problems!

Reviews.Title: Samsung fascinate
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: Phone has bad reception as well as light scratches. The phone itself works fine. Well packaged. Charger is short but it works.

Reviews.Title: The phone has one flaw....
Reviews.Author: pamela
Reviews.Content: The phone does  not vibrate it only rings. Overall, the general quality of the cell phone is good, with the exception that it does not vibrate.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: MARVIN SCOGIN
Reviews.Content: just like a brand new phone and the shipper bent over backwards to make things wright. thanks again it works great

Reviews.Title: very good.
Reviews.Author: Tomas
Reviews.Content: That cell phone was the same that I expected, very good. functional, housing good, all application were fine. congratulation for your store and service.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Fascinate
Reviews.Author: Connie Woodbury
Reviews.Content: It was a cheap price - very reasonable.  The only problem I have is if you put it to close to your head it disconnects phone call.

ProductInfo.Features:
Weight - 4.1 oz   (116 g)
Dimensions - 4.91" x 2.52" x 0.41"
Resolution: 480 x 800 pixels
2 GB internal storage
CDMA 850 / 1900
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Fascinate i500 White Verizon Wireless [Non-retail Packaging]
